head.citation-title: Proceedings - 2016 International Conference on Multimedia Systems and Signal Processing, ICMSSP 2016
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 24 papers. The topics discussed include: SSLMS algorithm based impulsive noise cancellation from ECG signal; objectifying rehabilitative tests with singular spectrum analysis; color image reconstructions from Bessel-Fourier moments; adaptive post filter for reducing block artifacts in high efficiency video coding; interactive object extraction from a video based on seed-line tracking; enhanced hemisphere concept for color pixel classification; salient boundary detection in the gradient spaces; impression estimation of a video based on the valence-arousal model; research and systematic design on satellite integrated data management technology; a Bayesian network approach to study undergraduates' brand consciousness; an improved artificial bee colony for solving multi-objective optimization problems; detection of machines anomaly from log files in hard disk manufacturing process; adaptive iterative control for road simulation using the frequency domain filtered-X LMS algorithm; compactification of low-cost servo valve using buckled tubes and its application; 3D quasi-passive walker of bipedal robot with flat feet gait analysis of 3D quasi-passive walking; development of flow rate control type quasi-servo valve using small-sized on/off valves; remarks on hypercomplex-valued neural network-based direct adaptive controller; improvement of wearable power assist wear for low back support; development of pressure intensifier for water hydraulic McKibben muscles; and development of the manipulator for special environment.
